Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Phosphorous \Phos"phor*ous\ (f[o^]s"f[o^]r*[u^]s), a. [Cf. F. phosphoreux.] (Chem.) Of or pertaining to phosphorus; resembling or containing phosphorus; specifically, designating those compounds in which phosphorus has a lower valence as contrasted with phosphoric compounds; as, phosphorous acid, {H3PO3}. [1913 Webster]
phosphorous adj : containing or characteristic of phosphorus; "phosphoric acid" [syn: {phosphoric}]
